DialogueSection.Text: You finally made it. I see that you've learned how to start a conversation with people using the word Hanasu, but you'll need a few more words to get you started here.
One important word that you'll need is Tatakau. This word means to fight or attack.
You'll need to use this word to fight back if you encounter a monster or if someone challenges you to a fight.
You'll be able to gain more powers and words to help you in battles later.

For now, let's test out your fighting skills. If you can defeat three enemies from the field to the south of here, I should be able to use their power to remove the forcefield from the path to the icy mountains.
Come back once you've defeated three enemies from the fields to the south of here.
Remember, if you ever forget what a word means, you can review it in your dictionary.
A few more handy tools will be available later in your dictionary as you progress on your journey.
I'll also give you this help book.
Be sure to review information there and in your dictionary if you run into any trouble.
The path to the icy mountains should now be open. You can get there by going north from the field you started in.
